original_title: In the Mind of the Poker Pro: No Limit Tournament Hold'em Poker
overview: In the Mind of the Poker Pro is the most innovative and valuable DVD series available for teaching the cutting edge techniques and in-depth strategies for playing poker. Through its ingenious integration of poker play an in-depth analysis, you are given rare insight into the critical thought process of three of the world's greatest poker players:  * David Sklansky is the best-selling author and considered by man to be the number one authority on gambling in the world today. * Todd Brunson is a high-limit professional who learned from the very best- his father: Legendary two-time World Series of Poker(tm) Champion Doyle Brunson. * Mike Matusow- "Mike the Mouth" is a World Series of Poker(tm) Champion and the most colorful and controversial charactering all of professional poker.
title: In the Mind of the Poker Pro: No Limit Tournament Hold'em Poker
